title: Day 1184
content:
# Day 1184

Man the sleep I got last night was top notch. I don't usually go to bed early, but when I do oh my gosh it is fantastic!!!

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*VoE5aGNe8GIG9vVP)

Went on a triple date tonight. Honestly, it was delightful and I should do this more often.

There's something special about everyone hanging out together but also breaking off a bit , women chatting with women, bros hanging with bros. Me and my slimes slipped outside for a cigar while the ladies stayed inside and talked. Then we all regrouped and talked some more. Chill, balanced, and hilarious. Also guilt-free because no one's left out.

Life really is better with people. I forget that sometimes caught in the endless scroll, stuck in my own head, chronically online. But tonight reminded me: real connection is irreplaceable. We're meant to meet, laugh, share air with people we like.

I'm grateful. Grateful to celebrate a friend's birthday with people I love. Grateful my dad watched Sloan. Grateful I didn't drink. Not because I'm a saint but I just know myself and I'm more a "let's get drunk or not at all" kind of guy. Plus, I worked out with my dad earlier and didn't want to wreck my gains.

I'll conclude today's post by noting I went down a rabbit hole today:

![[https://thegreattaking.com](https://thegreattaking.com/)](https://miro.medium.com/1*CLh1hppvhSSBSxbR_JF_Uw.png)

But this rabbit hole is for another day. It's a dark thing to unpack but the TL;DR securities don't grant ownership like we thought they did. Really shouldn't be surprised considering we live in a fiat system starved of collateral, but it doesn't make it right.

Got Bitcoin?

6/18/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
